title: MCPE村民将会添加交易系统
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2015-1-20 11:25 编辑 
MCPE NEWS: Emeralds will become more usable when the villager AI is developed further, and incorporates the trading system.

MCPE新闻：村民AI开发后结合交易系统，使绿宝石会更加有用。

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content: 火把三连发系列A.A村民现在确实太蠢了…

replies.author: hsk001ufo
replies.txt_content: 终于可以在爪机里面看到屌面人了

replies.author: 木叶の阿尔
replies.txt_content: 让绿宝石变得更有用，本身不是没用么？（好吧装饰）

replies.author: defoliation_h
replies.txt_content: 最好再加一个铁傀儡，嗯~~
